content: ली {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (लयति) To melt, dissolve. {vII.v} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> (लिनाति) {@--1@} To adhere. {@--2@} To melt, usually with वि. {vIII.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (लीयते, लीन) {@--1@} To stick or adhere firmly to, cling to; <ls>M. 3. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To clasp, embrace. {@--3@} To lie or rest on, recline, stay or dwell in, lurk, hide, cower; (भृगांगनाः) लीयंते मुकुलांतरेषु शनकैः संजातलज्जा इव <ls>Ratn. 1. 26</ls>; हरिशिशुरुत्पतितुं द्रागंगान्याकुंच्य लीयते निभृतं <ls>Bv. 1. 106</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 9</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 16</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 12</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 21</ls>; <ls>Bk. 18. 13</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 26.</ls> {@--4@} To be dissolved, melt away. {@--5@} To be sticky or viscous. {@--6@} To be absorbed in, be devoted or attached to; माधव मनसिजविशिखभयादिव भावनया त्वयि लीना <ls>Gīt. 4.</ls> {@--7@} To vanish, disappear. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (लापयतिते, लाययति-ते, लीनयति-ते, लालयति-ते) To melt, dissolve, liquefy. (The form लापयते is used in the sense of ‘to honour’, ‘cause to be honoured’; जटाभिर्लापयते = पूजामधिगच्छति; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. I. 3. 70</ls>).
लीः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Adhering, clinging to. {@--2@} Embracing. {@--3@} Melting, dissolving.
